text: Dimaadua gu longono Ia digau Israel, gei Mee gaa wanga digau Canaan gi lala nadau mogobuna. Digau Israel gu hagammaa digaula la gi hagalee ngaadahi mo nadau waahale. Deelaa di mee ne haga ingoo di gowaa deelaa bolo Hormah.21.3 Hormah: di ingoo deenei dono hadinga i nnelekai Hebrew boloo, “Hagammaa gi hagalee”
